title: Problem start of game
body:
I have a problem when I hit a game, the "tips" screen keeps frozen on top for  a good 2 minutes in game time.

Might possibly be related to alt-tabbing.

replies.body: That's weird, even if alt-tabbing it's weird to have the tips rendered there.  Have you had any connection issues?  I can see something like this happening if you have packet loss, so it misses communication to remove or add assets.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for me and let me know if it finds anything odd like that!
